          <title>
            <string language="fr">La structure de l'intérieur de la Terre</string>
            <string language="en">The structure of the Earth's interior</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Struktur des Innerens der Masse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A estrutura do interior da terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La struttura dell'interiore della terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η δομή του γήινου εσωτερικού</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La estructura del interior de la tierra</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration montre la structure interne de la terre. Les parties et les composants de l'intérieur de la  terre sont indiqués.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the internal structure of the Earth. The parts and components of the Earth's interior are indicated.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">croûte</string>
            <string language="en">crust</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">la terre</string>
            <string language="en">Earth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">structure interne</string>
            <string language="en">internal structure</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="en">iron</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

            <string language="en">mantle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

            <string language="en">molten outer core</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">nickel</string>
            <string language="en">nickel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">noyau intérieur plein</string>
            <string language="en">solid inner core</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">roche en planche</string>
            <string language="en">solid rock</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die interne Struktur der 
Masse. Die Teile und die Elemente des Innerens der Masse werden 
angezeigt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a estrutura interna da 
terra. As partes e os componentes do interior da terra são 
indicados.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra la struttura interna 
della terra. Le parti ed i componenti dell'interiore della terra
sono indicati.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει εσωτερική δομή της γης. 
Τα μέρη και τα συστατικά του γήινου εσωτερικού είναι 
υποδειγμένα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la estructura interna 
de la tierra. Las partes y los componentes del interior de la 
tierra se indican.</string>
          </description>
